title: Land Use Permissible - All land uses mentioned in this UDCPR shall be permissible in the Improvement Schemes
clause_text: Land Use Permissible - All land uses mentioned in this UDCPR shall be permissible in the Improvement Schemes. Development Charges - The Development charges shall be recovered as mentioned in these regulations.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Land Use Permissible - All land uses mentioned in this UDCPR shall be permissible in the Improvement Schemes.
